image.content: example of tart recipe with serving suggestions

recipe.quotation: The sweet frangipane filling with almonds is a lovely addition and really bring these little tarts to whole new flavour level.
recipe.title: Apple Frangipane Tart
recipe.content: 3/4 cup almond meal 1 1/2 tbsp plain flour 1/4cup sugar...

instructions.paragraph: Preheat the oven to 200degrees C. Place the pastry on a lined oven tray to thaw. Cut 1 sheet into 4 squares...
For frangipane filling, cream the sugar...
Brush with melted butter and sprinkle...
